sentences.english: Conclusion:Injectio Salviae Miltiorrhizae Composita, as add-on treatment of bronchiolitis of newborn, has a good efficacy.

sentences.english: Could you do me a favor and proofread my resume before I send it out to the human recources department?

sentences.english: According to "Zuo Zhuan", Governor Hua was a magistrate who assisted the king to rule the country in the Song State.

sentences.english: Lee san-hae warned son-in-law Li Dexin defend the country must be good for you.

sentences.english: His second duty is to obey the law and help the government (to) maintain order.
sentences.chinese: 他第二件责任是从命法令而且辅佐政府维持治安。

definition: to put in an important position
loyal and devoted (idiom); faithful and true
to assist a ruler in governing a country/prime minister
the task of establishing and maintaining hegemony
to seize power/to conquer the world/to establish and expand a business/to carve out a career for oneself
war on all sides (idiom); fighting from all four quarters
the most senior minister of many kingdoms or dynasties (with varying roles)/prime minister
achievement/meritorious deed/contributions (for the good of society)
